Jumbo.subscription: One subscription for all platforms for $19.99/year
Jumbo.info: No registration or Credit Card required
Promo.item-1: Always up to date with the latest in general internal medicine
Promo.item-2: A great balance between a thorough medical reference and a practical clinical guide
Promo.item-3: One subscription, any device. Available for iOS, Android and now directly on the web

Feature.item-1.title: Powerful Search
Feature.item-1.sub-title: Search function has been optimized for clinical use. You can even search using common abbreviations.
Feature.item-1.text: Search htn, you get the arterial hypertension page.

Feature.item-2.title: Medical Design
Feature.item-2.sub-title: Designed by physicians for physicians. What we need when we need it.
Feature.item-2.text: Re-organize the tabs, see and access your notes quickly, browse the references and more.

Feature.item-3.title: Note Sync (iOS and Web)
Feature.item-3.sub-title: Take personal notes within the sections and synchronize them across your iOS devices (requires a free account).
Feature.item-3.text: Your precious notes are also saved on our servers, meaning if you ever lose your device, you’ll be able to recover them.

Feature.item-4.title: App Integration (iOS only)
Feature.item-4.MedCalX.title: MedCalX Integration
Feature.item-4.MedCalX.text: Direct access to the trusted medical calculator (sold separately). Easy access means you’ll use it.
Feature.item-4.QxMD.title: Read by QxMD
Feature.item-4.QxMD.text: References vetted by Dr Lanthier himself. Link to the references in Read so you can build a quality collection of papers.

Feature.item-5.title: Always Up To Date
Feature.item-5.sub-title: Frequent updates by Dr Lanthier himself means your decisions are supported by the latest medical evidence.
Feature.item-5.text: Approximately three content update per year.

Feature-topics.title: Featured Topics

Feature-topics.control2.title: Browse all topics in Web app

Doctors-item1.name: Luc Lanthier
Doctors-item1.text: Dr Luc Lanthier practices General Internal Medicine at the Sherbrooke University Hospital Center and is a Professor of Medicine at the Faculty of Medicine and Health Sciences of the University of Sherbrooke. He is former chair of the French Examination Board for Internal Medicine Exam at the Royal College of Physicians and Surgeons of Canada.

Doctors-item2.name: Donald Echenberg
Doctors-item2.text: Dr Donald Echenberg practices General Internal Medicine at the Sherbrooke University Hospital Center and is an Associate Professor of Medicine at the Faculty of Medicine and Health Sciences of the University of Sherbrooke. He is past president of the Canadian Society of Internal Medicine and is currently Governor of the Quebec Chapter of the American College of Physicians.

Footer-infectio-text: Do you have more specific needs for infectious diseases?
